steps.step: Step back into a left neutral bow while executing a left vertical outward block.
Extend your left outward block forward into a head level left straight punch.
Pivot into a left forward bow while executing a right reverse punch to the solar plexus.
Execute a right snapping front kick with left punch.
Land back into a left forward bow while executing a right reverse punch.
Step forward and through with your right foot into a right neutral bow while executing a right outward vertical block.
Extend your right outward block forward into a right straight punch.
Pivot into a right forward bow while executing a left reverse punch to the solar plexus.
Execute a left snapping front kick with a right punch.
Land back into a right forward bow while executing a left reverse punch.
Step back to 3:00 into a left neutral bow while executing a left vertical outward block.
Extend your left outward block forward into a left straight punch.
Pivot into a left forward bow while executing a right reverse punch to the solar plexus.
Execute a right snapping front kick with a left punch.
Land back into a left forward bow while executing a right reverse punch.
